posts.post_content:
Want to trade my SGC T205 HOF for PSA equal. 
I am working on a T205 HOF set . Most of the cards are PSA graded but I have a few SGC graded. Looking to trade the SGC graded ones for the Same card graded by PSA .Only looking to trade for cards without creases.  Would also add cash for higher grade.

Have available to trade
Walter Johnson - SGC 40/3- for PSA 3 or 4
Tris Speaker -SGC 40/3-for PSA 3 or 4
Chief Bender-SGC 40/3 - for PSA 3 or 4
Joe Tinker -SGC 45/ 3.5 for PSA 3.5 or 4
Rube Marquard -SGC 50/4 -for PSA 4

Thanks for looking
Stay Safe
John P
